sentence.Network_en: Happiness is never really so welcome as changelessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 说真的,幸福从来不如稳定那么受欢迎.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这一不变性(Changelessness)的概念是我们只能使用大脑就可以理解的存有之世界的一个方面。我们不能借助我们的感官这种普通的渠道来接近存在,因为感官总是与物质世界.

list.abs: Schmidt : maintain current resources what what we do to use scale to be stabilized relatively namely , especially we will maintain nuclear energy to use scale changeless .施密特：我们所做的就是保持当前能源使用比例相对稳定，特别是我们将保持核能使用比例不变。
Such , the surface sees the value changeless , fell however actually a half grade ., 这样 , 表面看价格不变 , 实际上却降了一个半等级.
Yahoo objects what Yi pits offering stoutly , in order to keep existing directorate member changeless .雅虎果断反对伊坎的提议，以维持现有董事会成员不变。
extends stock dividend , accuse a partner effectiveness changeless , small shareholder effectiveness increases in ., 发放股票股利 , 控股股东效用不变 , 中小股东效用增加.

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of being unchangeable; having a marked tendency to remain unchanged
